languages.text: Implants maddening thoughts into the weak-willed members of the enemy crew, making them start {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}fires{/g} aboard their own ships.
languages.original_text: Внушает безумные мысли слабовольным членам вражеской команды, заставляя их устраивать {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}пожары{/g} на своих кораблях.

languages.text: Pflanzt den willensschwachen Mitgliedern der gegnerischen Besatzung verrückte Gedanken in den Kopf und bringt sie dazu, an Bord ihrer eigenen Schiffe {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Brände zu legen{/g}.
languages.original_text: Implants maddening thoughts into the weak-willed members of the enemy crew, making them start {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}fires{/g} aboard their own ships.

languages.text: Implante dans les esprits faibles des membres d'équipage ennemis de folles pensées qui les poussent à allumer des {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendies{/g} à bord de leurs propres vaisseaux.

languages.text: 在意志薄弱的敌方船员意识之中植入疯狂的想法，让他们在自己的船上{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}纵火{/g}。
languages.original_text: Implants maddening thoughts into the weak-willed members of the enemy crew, making them start {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}fires{/g} aboard their own ships.

traits.locale_text: 在意志薄弱的敌方船员之中植入疯狂的想法，让他们在自己的船上纵火。{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}{/g}
在意志薄弱的敌方船员意识之中植入疯狂的想法，让他们在自己的船上纵火。

languages.text: Implanta pensamientos enloquecedores en los miembros con menor fuerza de voluntad de la tripulación enemiga, incitándoles a provocar {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendios{/g} a bordo de sus naves.

languages.text: 精神力の弱い敵クルーに狂気的な思考を植え付け、自身の船に{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}火災{/g}を起こさせる。
languages.original_text: Implants maddening thoughts into the weak-willed members of the enemy crew, making them start {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}fires{/g} aboard their own ships.

traits.locale_text: 精神力の弱い敵クルーに狂気的な思考を植え付け、自身の船に{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}火災{/g}を起こさせる。
精神力の弱い敵クルーに狂気的な思考を植え付け、自身の船に火災を起こさせる。

languages.text: Düşman mürettebatın zayıf iradeli üyelerine çıldırtıcı düşünceler aşılayarak kendi gemilerinde {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}yangınlar{/g} çıkarmalarına sebep olur.
